vote.title: Referendum: Deregulation, AI and Blockchain for Germany
vote.main_title: From bureaucracy problem to competitive advantage: Deregulation, AI and blockchain herald a new era for Germany
vote.intro: Germany is known for its thorough but paralyzing bureaucracy. What was previously considered a major competitive disadvantage – endless forms, complex rules and tedious processes – could now become the greatest opportunity for our country. Because this over-regulation can be transformed into a unique competitive advantage with the help of innovative technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI) and blockchain.
vote.vision: Imagine: Germany is the first country to fully digitize and automate its complex legal landscape. Instead of drowning in paper mountains as before, clear, fast and fair processes emerge that relieve and strengthen citizens, companies and authorities alike. Germany could become a global model for intelligent administration and rule-of-law innovation.
vote.advantage_title: Why does today's bureaucracy become a competitive advantage with deregulation, AI and blockchain?
vote.advantage_text: Through systematic deregulation and the precise digital translation of existing regulations into clear and automatically applicable rules, German companies could secure enormous advantages. The intelligent simplification of regulations combined with effortless compliance reduces costs, accelerates approvals and creates legal security that attracts companies from around the world to Germany.
vote.deregulation_text: Smart deregulation doesn't mean fewer rules, but better rules. AI systems analyze all existing regulations and automatically identify redundant, contradictory or outdated rules. These are systematically removed or simplified, while meaningful and necessary rules are preserved. The result: A lean, efficient and understandable legal landscape.
vote.blockchain_text: Blockchain technology provides transparent and absolutely secure storage of all processes. Every administrative act is documented in a traceable and tamper-proof manner. This creates trust, prevents fraud and manipulation and strengthens Germany's reputation as a location with the highest integrity and reliability.
vote.ai_title: Why AI makes the decisive difference:
vote.ai_text: A neutral and powerful AI automatically and fairly monitors compliance with regulations. It detects irregularities immediately, reduces human errors and prevents arbitrariness. This creates trust and fairness – both among citizens and international investors.
vote.new_era_text: With this technological revolution, Germany could become a global pioneer and model – a country that manages to transform its greatest weakness into its greatest strength. Innovation instead of stagnation, clarity instead of bureaucracy chaos – Germany could rise to become one of the most progressive societies in the world.
vote.future_title: Why this is the most important thing for Germany's future:
vote.future_text: Only if we now have the courage to radically modernize our administration can we secure long-term prosperity, competitiveness and quality of life for future generations. The triple combination of deregulation, AI and blockchain is not just an opportunity, but the decisive prerequisite for Germany to take a leadership role in global competition and remain attractive for citizens and companies.
